name: "Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman" Season Four Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "Halloween III", as what romantic couple did Doctor Mike and Sully appear at the Halloween party?
questions.explanation:
Cinderella and Prince Charming.

	Unbeknownst to Doctor Mike, Sully and Matthew were working on a pumpkin carriage for Doctor Mike since they were going as Cinderella and Prince Charming to the Halloween party. Doctor Mike didn't know about the carriage until the night of the party.

questions.text: What name did the Colorado Springs baseball team take when they played against the Denver All-Stars team?
questions.explanation:
Springers.

	Most of the town gathered in Jake's barbershop to come up with a name for the team. Brian suggested the Colorado Springers. After many suggestions, the team ultimately became the Colorado Springers.  In an interview with Orson Bean. he said that after the baseball episode, the entire cast would play baseball anytime they had a chance to play.

questions.text: Ingrid died of rabies in the episode "Brother's Keeper", but how did she contract the disease?
options: Trying to protect her, Wolf accidently bit her.
questions.explanation:
Pup bit her.

	Brian's wolf, Pup, returned to the series in season four episode, "Homecoming". In the episode "Brother's Keeper", he was attacked by a rabid raccoon. They tied him up in the barn, but he dumped his water bucket. Ingrid took some water into him, but Pup got scared and bit her.

questions.text: What was the name of Sully's friend who wrote requesting help from Sully in Nevada?
questions.explanation:
Daniel.

	Daniel and Sully worked in the mines together when Sully came out west. Daniel saved Sully's life during a mine collapse and Sully owed him. After Sully met Abigail, Daniel drifted away from the two of them and ended up in Nevada. Sully left for Nevada in "Promises, Promises" and was gone a month.

questions.text: In "Dealing with the Devil", who was the "devil" to Reverend Johnson?
questions.explanation:
Hank.

	Reverend Johnson borrowed money from Hank and took the church as collateral. When Reverend Johnson couldn't pay the money back, Hank took the church from him. When all the town rallied around Reverend Johnson, Hank changed his mind about taking the church.

questions.text: Doctor Mike wanted to climb Pike's Peak for her birthday on her own, but Dorothy, Myra, and Grace tagged along. Out of the four women, which one was injured and didn't make it to the top of Pike's Peak?
questions.explanation:
Doctor Mike.

	Doctor Mike fell and injured her arm and knee in the fall. She didn't get to climb to the top of the mountain, but made Dorothy, Myra, and Grace go to the top. They brought back a flower for Doctor Mike and left one up there for Sam.  In the February 10, 1996 edition of "TV Guide", Doctor Mike and Sully were named one of ten favorite couples on television.

questions.text: When Hank's Nana first came to town, what did she believe he worked as in Colorado Springs?
questions.explanation:
Tailor.

	Nana got off the train in Colorado Springs believing Hank was a tailor. Myra and baby Samantha helped him with the ruse by making her believe they were his wife and daughter. Myra made Horace give up the telegraph office so Hank's Nana would think he quit being a tailor to run the telegraph office.

questions.text: Who started a fight at the new site for Preston's health resort?
questions.explanation:
Horace.

	Horace started bad mouthing Preston and then Myra. Hank punched Preston when he tried to intervene and then he and Horace got into a fight. Grace's food was ruined when Hank and Horace knocked over the picnic table. Matthew finally got them separated.

questions.text: What disease was discussed in "Fear Itself" that had the town ready to banish its new visitor?
questions.explanation:
Leprosy.

	Preston was smitten with the town's new guest, but turned away from her when he learned she had leprosy. Brian and Doctor Mike were the only ones that didn't turn away from her after her illness was learned. When Brian saw her leaving on the train, Sully made everyone realize how wrong it was to make her feel unwelcome in the town.

questions.text: Katharine Sully was born in the woods miles outside of Colorado Springs. Who delivered Sully and Doctor Mike's baby while stuck in the woods?
questions.explanation:
Sully.

	While injured with a broken ankle and injured shoulder, Sully delivered his daughter. They announced her name in town as Katharine Sully and nicknamed her Katie. After returning to the homestead, Matthew, Colleen and Brian introduced themselves to Katie and showed her different parts of the house and barn.
